subject: Football
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Smith Center Redmen defeated Pittsburg/St. Mary’s-Colgan yesterday, 40-14, in the title game of the Kansas 2-1A high school division. It was their 54th consecutive victory and their 4th straight state championship. The Redmen need one more perfect season to break a state record for most consecutive victories, 66. “It’s been a top-of-the-mountain kind of season,” said Smith Center’s athletic director, Gregg Hobelmann.
